ingredients: 1/4 cup almond meal or flaxseed meal (optional)
steps: Wash, core, and dice the apples and pears.
Combine fruit with lemon juice, sugar, and cinnamon in a 9x9 baking dish.
In a separate bowl, mix oats, almond meal, walnuts, maple syrup, coconut oil, vanilla, and salt. Spread over fruit.
Sprinkle with additional cinnamon for garnish.
Bake 35-40 minutes until fruit is fork-tender.
title: Apple Pear Crisp
